USERS(1) User Commands USERS(1)

NAME

users - display a compact list of users logged in

SYNOPSIS

users [file]

DESCRIPTION

Users gives a on-line summary of the names of users currently logged in. If a file argument is given, users uses this file to get the list of users instead of /var/run/utmp.

SEE ALSO

who(1)

10/26/03 Heirloom Toolchest
